name: com.gamelovers.gamedata
author: Miguel Tomas
description: Core data utilities and configuration management for Unity games. Includes observable data types (fields, lists, dictionaries), deterministic floats (floatP), serialization helpers, type-safe config storage, versioning, and backend sync support.
